{{getName()}} Todos

All tasks were completed
Description Action
{{item.id}} {{item.description}}
Yes
No
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { TodoModel } from './todo.model'; @Component({ selector: 'todo', templateUrl: './todo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./todo.component.css'] }) export class TodoComponent { constructor(){} displayAll:boolean = true; inputText:string = ""; private name:string = "Osman" getName():string{ return this.name; } private items:TodoModel[] =[ {id:1,description: "Get out of bed", done: true}, {id:2,description: "Brush teeth", done: false}, {id:3,description: "Eat breakfast", done: false}, {id:4,description: "Go to work", done: false}, ] addItem(){ if (this.inputText !== "") { this.items.push({id:this.items.length+1,description: this.inputText, done: false}) }else{ alert("Please enter a description") } } getItems():TodoModel[]{ if (this.displayAll) { return this.items }else{ return this.items.filter(item => !item.done) } } }
